attributes.action: make schools who have bullying have the anti bullying scheme enforced instead of allowing the schools to choose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When children are bullied at school parents have very few options. I want schools to be responsible for the care of my child and me to be able to do something about the bullying instead of the school having all of the options I have to go along with.
